title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - So Energy streamlines customer service with AI-powered automation (BIZ211)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - So Energy 通过 AI 驱动的自动化简化客户服务 (BIZ211)
abstract: Legacy contact center solutions weren’t built for today’s customer expectations. Managing fragmented voice, chat, and email systems creates friction for administrators, agents, and customers alike. Join AWS and So Energy — a UK-based renewable energy provider — to learn how you can modernise ageing customer service experiences by consolidating disjointed channels into a single, unified application with Amazon Connect. Leveraging AI-powered automation and deep CRM integration, learn how So Energy agents gained a single view of the customer journey, enabling them to resolve issues faster and reduce manual effort — while customers enjoy a seamless, consistent experience across every channel.
abstract_cn: 传统的联络中心解决方案无法满足当今客户的期望。管理分散的语音、聊天和电子邮件系统会给管理员、座席和客户带来摩擦。加入 AWS 和 So Energy（一家英国可再生能源供应商）的行列，了解如何通过 Amazon Connect 将分散的渠道整合到单一统一的应用程序中，从而实现老化客户服务体验的现代化。借助 AI 驱动的自动化和深度 CRM 集成，了解 So Energy 座席如何获得客户旅程的单一视图，使他们能够更快地解决问题并减少手动工作——同时客户可以在每个渠道享受无缝、一致的体验。
